title: Mailcreak newsletter manager
description: A full-stack web app built with React and Node.js, designed to streamline newsletter creation, subscriber management, and performance tracking. Styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive interface.

title: eVault Landing Page
description: The website serves as the landing page for a startup subscription provider, with a focus on offering internet subscriptions, TV subscriptions, airtime, and instant payment solutions for schools and businesses. The platform aims to streamline the subscription management process, providing customers with a user-friendly interface to easily sign up, manage, and pay for their various subscription services.

title: ABKHD online market place
description: A simple yet effective mini e-commerce platform built using the MEVN (MongoDB, Express, Vue.js, Node.js) stack. The platform features a clean and intuitive product listing interface, allowing users to browse and explore the available offerings. When a user is interested in a product, they are seamlessly redirected to the company's WhatsApp Business profile, where they can directly chat with a representative to discuss the product details and make payments. The platform also includes a dedicated admin interface, empowering the startup team to easily upload, manage, and update the product catalog. This MEVN stack-based project showcases the team's proficiency in implementing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionalities, demonstrating their technical expertise and ability to deliver a user-friendly e-commerce solution.

title: LaCalle Cafe
description: A website project for the La Calle Cafe business built using Wordpress and PHP with integrated SEO tools.

title: My Personal Portfolio
description: Designed and developed a ReactJS portfolio with fancy 3D animations using Three.js for the background element.

title: Green Cart
description: An online store mobile app for purchasing healthy natural products built with React Native, JavaScript TSX, previewed with Expo Go.

title: Resume Forge
description: An intuitive resume builder web app enabling users to craft professional resumes and download them as PDFs. Developed with React and Node.js, and styled with Tailwind CSS for a sleek user experience.
